artist: Painter: After Sir Joshua Reynolds; Printer: John Young
description: portrait of Mrs. Angerstein and her daughter, Julia, almost full length; seated truned right looking front with arms around child on her lap; cradle beside to right with curtain behind
inscription:
Title, Date. and Inscription

below image in black: REYNOLDS / London, March 20, 1823. Published by J. Young, 65 Upper Charlotte Street, Fitzroy Square / and by / Mess\'rs Hurst, Robinson & Co. go Cheapside | on sheet in pencil 2-286
title: Reynolds
